subfields.name: chapAuthDiscovery
subfields.label: Chap Authentication Discovery
subfields.helptext: Support for iSCSI Discovery CHAP authentication.

subfields.name: chapAuthSession
subfields.label: CHAP Authentication Session
subfields.helptext: Support for iSCSI Session CHAP authentication.

subfields.name: fsType
subfields.label: Filesystem Type
subfields.helptext: The type of the filesystem, eg: 'ext4', 'xfs', 'ntfs'

subfields.name: initiatorName
subfields.label: Initiator Name
subfields.helptext: Custom iSCSI Initiator Name. If initiatorName is specified with iscsiInterface simultaneously, new iSCSI interface <target portal>:<volume name> will be created for the connection.

subfields.name: iscsiInterface
subfields.label: iSCSI Interface
subfields.helptext: iSCSI Interface Name that uses an iSCSI transport. Defaults to 'default' (tcp).

subfields.name: portals
subfields.label: iSCSI Portal List
subfields.helptext: iSCSI Target Portal List. The portal is either an IP or ip_addr:port if the port is other than default (typically TCP ports 860 and 3260).

subfields.name: targetPortal
subfields.label: Target Portal
subfields.helptext: Target iSCSI Portal. The Portal is either an IP or ip_addr:port if the port is other than default (typically TCP ports 860 and 3260).

subfields.name: secretRef
subfields.label: Secret Reference
subfields.helptext: CHAP Secret for iSCSI target and initiator authentication.

subfields.name: name
subfields.label: Name of secret
subfields.helptext: The name of the kubernetes secret.

subfields.name: readOnly
subfields.label: Read Only
subfields.helptext: Enabling it will force the ReadOnly property in VolumeMounts.
